title: Garen’s villain passive needs to be removed
body:
There’s nothing quite like stomping him in lane only for you to become the villain and take 80% of your HP in true damage + ignite to finish you in mere seconds to guy going full tank because he got rocked. This shit is such a terrible design - you should never have a mechanic that punishes people for doing well.

To clarify, I realize killing Garen alone doesn’t make you the villain. But the moment you’ve taken the lead you’ve gotten from killing him and apply it somewhere else, you are going to be made the villain. And eventually you’ll be confronted with dealing with him as the villain and he’ll melt you before you can even do anything to him because of silence + true damage burst. Not to mention, this is just a bad mechanic in general that ends up being anti-melee or useless. If the ranged ADC becomes villain, there’s a good chance Garen won’t even touch them - all the more reason to remove it and give him something better and easier to balance.

They need to do a small rework to him. This is the Direction I would Like to see.

#1. Make the Villain Mechanic tied to Q, but increase Q CD by 3-5s. So that Q marks the target as the villain for 5 seconds. Keep the scaling/availability tied to R. Killing the Villain Resets Q.

This Kinda kills 2 birds with 1 stone. 1 Nerfing the Q up-time, giving more Counter-play while its on CD, and making it so the Villain Mechanic is no longer more of an RNG thing and its more controlled. It also gives Garen a reward for Killing the Villain, and makes it so that Garen can not just Flash > R the Villain, it will require set up.

IMO the mechanic needs to stay in some form or fashion, as Garen has no way of dealing with Tanks other than hoping they are the Villain atm.

#2. Give E AS scaling, this should already be a thing honestly. 

This opens up more building paths for Garen while not actually buffing Tank/bruiser Garen

#3. Change his Passive to a shielding mechanic along the lines of: Hitting enemies builds stacks of Perseverance, at 100 stacks Garen gains a shield for a % of his Max HP for X seconds, at the end of the duration Garen is healed for 50% of the remaining shield. Hitting enemy champions and large/epic monsters gives more stacks. Stacks fall off slowly while out of combat. 

I would use his resource bar to show his current stack %. And this would give Garen a passive that is actually useful for fighting and dueling with, and move away from the "Run in trade, sit back and heal" aspect that is Garen. As a Garen main I feel his passive is utterly useless early game (can easily be constantly poked to keep it off, and its actual regen is pretty much shit.) and completely broken post 11, where I constantly tower-dive to 10% HP run away and have it all back in a matter of a few seconds. If you cant kill Garen Post 11 before he can escape, then its pointless even attacking him as he will have full HP in a few seconds and will be running back in at you. Changing it to this mechanic gives boths sides something to work with/around that is alot more interactive.
